Key Match Events: Zion Williamson electrified the crowd with some highlight-worthy dunks after returning from a 27-game absence with a hamstring injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Williamson emphasized the importance of not taking playing for a living for granted, stating that he loves hooping and has conversations with teammate Dejounte Murray about it.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Orleans Pelicans lost 104-97 to the Minnesota Timberwolves, dropping them to 7-30 on the season and effectively ending their postseason aspirations.
Others: The trade deadline is approaching next month, and questions remain about whether the team will make changes to their personnel, with Brandon Ingram's future in New Orleans uncertain.
